## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (22.5, 41.0)
Consists of boiler (position x=22.5 y=41.0), steam engine (position x=26.5 y=41.5), offshore pump (position x=-9.5 y=1.5), pumpjack (position x=17.5 y=40.5), and pipes connecting them (positions x=-8.5 y=1.5, x=-7.5 y=2.5, x=-6.5 y=3.5, x=-5.5 y=4.5, x=-4.5 y=5.5, x=-3.5 y=6.5, x=-2.5 y=7.5, x=-1.5 y=8.5, x=-0.5 y=9.5, x=0.5 y=10.5, x=1.5 y=11.5, x=2.5 y=12.5, x=3.5 y=13.5, x=4.5 y=14.5, x=5.5 y=15.5, x=6.5 y=16.5, x=7.5 y=17.5, x=8.5 y=18.5, x=9.5 y=19.5, x=10.5 y=20.5, x=11.5 y=21.5, x=12.5 y=22.5, x=13.5 y=23.5, x=14.5 y=24.5, x=15.5 y=25.5, x=16.5 y=26.5, x=17.5 y=27.5, x=17.5 y=28.5, x=17.5 y=29.5, x=17.5 y=30.5, x=17.5 y=31.5, x=17.5 y=32.5, x=17.5 y=33.5, x=17.5 y=34.5, x=17.5 y=35.5, x=17.5 y=36.5, x=17.5 y=37.5, x=17.5 y=38.5, x=18.5 y=38.5, x=15.5 y=38.5, x=5 y=38.5, x=14.5 y=38.5, x=13.5 y=38.5, x=12.5 y=38.5, x=11.5 y=38.5, x=23.5 y=39.5, x=20.5 y=40.5, x=19.5 y=41.5, x=22.5 y=32.5, x=22.5 y=33.5, x=22.5 y=34.5, x=22.5 y=35.5, x=22.5 y=36.5, x=22.5 y=37.5, x=22.5 y=38.5, x=22.5 y=39.5, x=28.5 y=39.5)

### Oil refinery at position (17.5, 45.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position x=17.5 y=45.5), connected to another oil refinery (position x=12.5 y=46.5) and a storage tank (position x=17.5 y=50.5), and connected to power network with ElectricityGroup(id=17052)

### Oil refinery at position (12.5, 46.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position x=12.5 y=46.5), connected to oil refinery (position x=17.5 y=45.5), and connected to power network with ElectricityGroup(id=17052)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure the player is within the maximum allowed distance (10 tiles) before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing pipe-to-ground
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before attempting to place a pipe-to-ground.

### Errors when dividing by zero
- Check if the target position is the same as the current position before performing division to avoid division by zero

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Ensure that the pipe connection is not blocked and the target is able to receive the fluid from the source.

### Errors when entities are not receiving electricity
- Ensure that the entities are connected to a power network and that the power network is functioning correctly.

### Errors when analyzing entities with 'NoneType
